Package com.novell.ldapchai.util

Utility classes associated with the LDAP Chai API.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PasswordRuleHelper A simple helper for clients that wish to consume the rules via traditional getters instead of reading rules and interpreting String values from a ChaiPasswordPolicy.
 

Class Summary
BCrypt BCrypt implements OpenBSD-style Blowfish password hashing using the scheme described in "A Future-Adaptable Password Scheme" by Niels Provos and David Mazieres.
ChaiLogger Internal Chai API logging wrapper.
ChaiUtility A collection of static helper methods used by the LDAP Chai API.
ConfigObjectRecord Represents a config object record stored in eDirectory used for holding complex data types.
DefaultChaiPasswordPolicy Makes a basic password policy using default password rules.
GenericRuleHelper A generic rule helper implementation.
SearchHelper SearchHelper is a mutable helper class for managing LDAP search queries.
StringHelper  
 

Package com.novell.ldapchai.util Description

Utility classes associated with the LDAP Chai API.

Author:
Jason D. Rivard
